name: Punks on the Road
description:
This roleplaying game for 1 player lets you start a band and go on tour! Grab a few dice and hit the road!

The game includes 2 zines, one with the rules and another is a journal used to play the game and chronicle your story!

Designed by Jason Kotarski (Singing Lungs, Green Couch Games, Questionable Mono Tapes, The Great Heartland Hauling Co.)
